author: alexandertuna
body:
#### PR description:

This is a PR which removes some dependency of LSTCore/standalone on CMSSW. In standalone, `printf` is used, and in a CMSSW environment, `edm::LogWarning` is used.


#### PR validation:

I ran the code locally and it works as expected. Chatgpt also approves.

cc @slava77 @ariostas @VourMa
title: Add LST_STANDALONE option for printf vs edm::LogWarning
